text: Victor Wembanyama ( ; ; born 4 January 2004), nicknamed "Wemby", is a French professional basketball player for the San Antonio Spurs of the National Basketball Association (NBA). With a listed height of 7 feet 4 inches (2.24 metres), Wembanyama is one of the tallest currently active NBA players. == References == Category:2004 births Category:Living people Category:Centers (basketball) Category:French basketball players Category:Medalists at the 2024 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for France Category:People from Yvelines Category:San Antonio Spurs players
title: Victor Wembanyama
